body.p: Our work on machine translation is based on our grammatical analysers for Saami languages, combined with bilingual dictionaries, grammatical transfer rules and a generation component. We build translation programs from North Saami to Norwegian, and between Saami languages. Giellatekno cooperates with Apertium on machine translation.
